mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT OFFSET #{page} ROWS FETCH NEXT 20 ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE SUB_CATEGORY_CODE = #{ageCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR PROTEIN_CODE = #{favoriteProteinCode}

SELECT P.ID AS ID, P.NAME AS NAME, COUNT(*) AS ORDERED_CNT FROM MEMBER M JOIN PET PT ON M.ID = PT.MEMBER_ID JOIN "ORDER" O ON M.ID = O.MEMBER_ID JOIN ORDER_DETAIL OD ON O.ID = OD.ORDER_ID JOIN PRODUCT P ON OD.PRODUCT_ID = P.ID WHERE PT.BREED_CODE = #{breedCode} AND MONTHS_BETWEEN( PT.BIRTH, #{birth} ) BETWEEN -12 AND 12 GROUP BY P.ID, P.NAME ORDER BY ORDERED_CNT DESC
